name: Noted451 - Ballad of The Sword-Lily Knight & The Sorcerer of Thistle
name_original: Noted451 - Ballad of The Sword-Lily Knight & The Sorcerer of Thistle
description: Lore and quest concept surrounding a famed hero of old and her greatest adversary -- both whom Romeo and Julian stumble across. With art and rough script of quest line.
